title: A Reconstructed Corpse
description:
4 X 30 mins

Out of work actor, professional drinker, unfaithful husband and occasional sleuth Charles Paris gets a job working on a crime reconstruction show. The reconstruction turns to murder when body parts start turning up.

Bill Nighy has a great time playing the disreputable Charles, investigating the murder, trying to patch up his on / off relationship with his estranged wife and bickering with his agent in an excellent example of the comedy murder mystery.
